body_html:
For those on macOs (like me), you can use brew to (temporarily) switch back to 3.6.5: link . I had to do
brew link --overwrite python in addition and then
pip install --upgrade tensorflow works fine
body_text:
For those on macOs (like me), you can use brew to (temporarily) switch back to 3.6.5: link . I had to do
brew link --overwrite python in addition and then
pip install --upgrade tensorflow works fine
body:
For those on macOs (like me), you can use brew to (temporarily) switch back to 3.6.5: [link](https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/329187/homebrew-rollback-from-python-3-7-to-python-3-6-5-x) . I had to do
`brew link --overwrite python` in addition and then
`pip install --upgrade tensorflow` works fine
